Hair Tie Holder: Develop a small holder that can be attached to the hair tie to keep it organized and prevent it from getting tangled with other hair ties.
Hair Tie Organizer: Design a small organizer that can hold multiple hair ties and keep them neat and tidy in a drawer or on a vanity.
Hair Tie Cover: Create a small cover that can be placed over the hair tie to protect it from dust and dirt.
Hair Tie Grip: Develop a small grip that can be attached to the hair tie to make it easier to hold and manipulate.
Hair Tie Winder: Create a small winder that can be used to wind up the hair tie and keep it from tangling.
